attributes.action: University fees in the uk should be equalised.
attributes.background: University fees in the uk should be equal regardless of which country you are born in. English students are being unfairly treated and leaving with exceptionally high levels of debt.Either scrap fees or all universities in the uk charge the same amount.

rejection.details:
University tuition fees in Wales, Scotland and Northern Ireland are a devolved matter. Consequently, the UK Government and Parliament are only concerned with tuition fees in England.

You may wish to submit a petition regarding the issue of tuition fees specifically in England. Alternatively, you may wish to sign one of the existing petitions on this subject.
